item.description:
***RSVPs are closed***

We have been invited us to their free 2011 Red Sox Kick Off Party on Thursday, April 7 from 5:30 pm until 8:30 pm.

Expect complimentary appetizer buffet, great prizes, red sox ticket give-aways, access to the Fenway Park batting cages, Mix 98.5 Radio, surprises and more.

We will have a Reserved Sky Box to sit and hang out.

Expect a crowd. Arrive early or later but early is better.

You must have RSVPd to be on the guest list at the door and included that you are a guest of Frank and the Red Sox Natives invited by John Barmon. This is a private event.

 

See you there.

 

Fenway Frank
item.how_to_find_us: Ask For The Red Sox Natives Reserved Sky Box
item.name: 2011 Red Sox Kick Off Party
